div1.p:
No. 137 Second Judicial District, W. T. Territory of Washington vs. Gus Bendjus et al.
Warrant
Returned and Filed this 13 day of Nov. A. D. 1887 H.M. Sutton. Clerk.
Bail Filed by the Court $300 Each. H.M. Sutton. Clerk.

United States of America
Territory of Washington Second Judicial District.
In the District Court holding terms at Montesano

Warrant Territory of Washington vs. Gus Bendjus Robert Stranglaud Pete Peterson Ben Frederickson Frank Nelson Fred Strinberger John Blending Andrew Johnson Leander Brown John Saxon John Thompson Alex Agnew Thomas Jacobs E. Emil Andrew Anderson Charles Bunke
The President of the United States To the Sheriff of Chehalis County

Greeting!
Whereas: Gus Bendjus, Robert Stranglaud, Pete Peterson, Ben Frederickson
Frank Nelson, Fred Strinberger, John Blending, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Saxon, John Thompson, Alex Agnew, Thomas Jacobs, E. Emil, Andrew Anderson, Charles Bunke: having been duly indicted in the District Court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory holding terms at Montesano of the crime of Riot - all of which appears to me of record.

Now, this is to command you, the said Sheriff to take the said Gus Bendjus, Robert Stranglaud, Ben Frederickson, Pete Peterson, Frank Nelson, Fred Strinberger, John Blending, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Saxon, John Thompson, Alex Agnew, Thomas Jacobs, E. Emel, Andrew Anderson, Charles Bunke, and them the said Gus Bendjus, Robert Stranglaud, Ben Frederickson, Pete Peterson, Frank Nelson, Fred Strinberger, John Blending, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Saxon, John Thompson, Alex Agnew, Thomas Jacobs, E. Emel, Andrew Anderson, Charles Burke, safely keep and have them forthwith in this point, there to answer to said change

and abide such for their order as the Court may make in the premises - herein fail not.
Witness, the Hon. Frank Allyn judge of the said District Court and the Seal of said Court, this 16 day of Sept A.D. 1887.
H.M. Sutton. Clerk.

I hereby certify that I received the written warrant on the 16 day of September AD 1887 and the same on the 17 day of September AD 1887 by arresting and taking in custody the following named defendants, Gus Bendjus, Robert Stronglaud, whose true name is Robert Stauglaud, Ben Frederickson, Frank Nelson, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Thompson, Alex Agnew, Thomas Jacobs, and court not then being in session, and the judge of the evil in named District Court having returned the bail required to $400.00 for each defendant under arrest, said amount of bail being for all charges against said parties. I did on the 19th day of October 1887, accept bail for the following named persons to wit Gus Bendjus, Robert Stauglaud, Ben Frederickson, Frank Nelson, Andrew Johnson, Leadner Brown, Alex Agnew, and Thomas Jacobs conditioned that they should appear at the next regular term of the District Court
to be held for Chehalis County, and from term to term thereafter until duly released by due process of law. In accepting said bail I discharged said parties from custody, and I have been unable after diligent search to find any of the other of the defendants named in the written warrant.

Dated this 14 day of November AD 1887.
W. H. Bush. Sheriff of Chehalis County
